intro: Foggy Clippers are a new gadget that solve the problem of getting your glasses foggy when using a facemask. In this instructable you will learn how to make your own Foggy Clippers step by step using Tinkercad as you main tool.
intro_items: Foggy Clippers are a new gadget that solve the problem of getting your glasses foggy when using a facemask.
In this instructable you will learn how to make your own Foggy Clippers step by step using Tinkercad as you main tool.
materiaux:
Supplies
  • Tinkercad
  • 3D printer
  • your own glasses frame measurement

etapes.html:
1. Step 1: Find Glasses Frame

Étapes :

  1. Go to a 3D printing website (there are millions on the internet). Find a model that fits you, download it, and paste it to a blank Tinkercad working space.

2. Step 2: Create the Shape of the Clippers

Étapes :

  1. .Grab a cylinder and make it flat and long enough to fit your design
  2. .Grab a circular cutter and cut your cylinder in a half moon shape
  3. .Copy this shape two times more (total of three)
  4. .Rotate the three half moons until you get a nice semicircle and put it together
  5. .Copy this new shape again

3. Step 3: Get Your Pieces Together

Étapes :

  1. .Attach your pieces together with the attaching tool (top right)
  2. .Then, copy this whole semicircle once
  3. .Now that you have two semicircles, attach them to your glasses, don’t forget to use the attach button!

4. Step 4: Finish Product

Étapes :

  1. Your finish product should look like this!!!
  2. you are done!!!!
